title: Villager Handbook
text: Villager Handbook allows people to get useful information about the game Animal Crossing, also communicate with friends through the app by sending greeting cards.

title: Group Project #2
text: This is a web-based application, which able to create a static webpage. Users are able to choose from colour themes, and buttons to allow the upload of images.

title: Group Project #1
text: This is a demo application can be considered as a starting point for a real company page as a third-party resource gathering engine. Then a simple click provides them with a URL to view their page. This application is developed under the concept of responsive design.

title: Eat De Burger
text: Eat De Burger is a restaurant application that allow user to enter the name of burger that they'd like eat, after 'order' placed, they can 'devour' it and remove the burger when they would like to 'try again'. This application follow the MVC design pattern and logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and ORM.
